subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Blog all should read and beware of...
author: Lisby
full_text:
Unless some other people are really having an unfair go at him  
somewhere else than here, his post was the equivalent of a primate  
beating his chest and throwing poop.

Ann

> I get from 60 Yahoogroups and about 20 other groups (mostly related to
